programme.title: Interior
Teror
programme.desc: Interior: Directed by Marek Lechki. With Magdalena Poplawska, Piotr Zurawski, Tomasz Sapryk, Lech Mackiewicz. Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. He drives across the interior of Poland, where people are preparing for a celebration of an unspecified anniversary. In the meanwhile, Magda (35), a Town Hall employee in charge of the anniversary events, Highly committed at first, gradually notices all the dirt and corruption around her. At some point, she must choose between her career and integrity, whether she should accept it or risk her career and leave. Finally, on the celebration day, Maciek and Magda finally meet. programme.title: Playing by Heart
Playing by heart
programme.desc: Playing by Heart: Directed by Willard Carroll. With Angelina Jolie, Dennis Quaid, April Grace, Patricia Clarkson. Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145734/","name":"Playing by Heart","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTMxYmVmZTgtZjc5Yi00N2VmLThmNGUtOGNiM2QwODJmMzY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUwNzk3NDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in Los Angeles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145734/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sylenski"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Positively Charming . . .","reviewBody":"When I first came across this movie I was somewhat unconvinced by the blurb given on the back of the DVD. However, I decided to give it a chance any way (mostly due to the excellent ensemble cast) and I found that I was completely surprised - this movie was positively charming ! Granted, it is not without its slightly exaggerated moments but in the end this does nothing but add to its charm ! Angelina Jolie's character, Joan is delightful if somewhat melodramatic and Gillian Anderson does a great job as the relationship-shy Meredith enraptured with, yet afraid to commit to, the charismatic Trent. Sean Connery's performance is effortless and the rest of the cast are all excellent as well. There are light moments and completely heart-breaking moments but all in all - it ends on such a high note of hope that one cannot help but be delighted !\n\nDefinitely worth your time - 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19300,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1999-01-22","keywords":"manhattan new york city,sister sister relationship,cheating,chicago illinois,divorce","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Playing By Heart","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3790577177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGM2ZDk3ZmUtNTUyYS00OTA3LTg1YjAtNzU2ODczMGJjYTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGM2ZDk3ZmUtNTUyYS00OTA3LTg1YjAtNzU2ODczMGJjYTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000096/","name":"Gillian Anderson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000995/","name":"Ellen Burstyn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000125/","name":"Sean Connery"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141033/","name":"Willard Carroll"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141033/","name":"Willard Carroll"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stir Crazy
Šašavi robijaši
programme.desc:
Stir Crazy: Directed by Sidney Poitier. With Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, Georg Stanford Brown, JoBeth Williams. Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0081562/","name":"Stir Crazy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmFkM2NiYTktODYwOC00NmI5LTgyNmItYTYzZGU1ZTJiN2E5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU4Nzk4MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0081562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hitchcockthelegend"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A hundred and twenty five years... Oh God, Oh God... Ill be a hundred and sixty one when I get out.","reviewBody":"Stir Crazy is directed by Sidney Poitier and written by Bruce Jay Friedman. It stars Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, Miguel Angel Suarez, Georg Stanford Brown, JoBeth Williams and Erland Van Lidth. Plot has Pryor and Wilder as two care free New York buddies who after getting fired from their jobs decide to make their way to Hollywood in search of better fortunes. However, after taking up a gig as promotional woodpeckers for a bank's advertisement drive, they find themselves framed for robbing the bank and sentenced to 125 years each in prison ..

The second pairing of Wilder and Pryor proves to be the best of their output on film. With their chemistry skin tight, film is full of laughs until a big slow down for the last third when the inevitable attempt at a prison break out occurs. Poitier's direction isn't up to anything other than correctly letting his two lead stars strut their stuff. But along with writer Friedman, he has to be accountable for letting the comedy dry up as the film chooses tension over humour which undoubtedly doesn't sit at all right. Still, the first hour is a joy ride, particularly once the guys land in prison, here the comedy reaches its peak and the contrast of the two characters played by Wilder and Pryor really mines the set-up for all is worth. Wilder is oblivious to the hazards of prison life, Pryor is street savvy and fully aware of the perils around every brick walled corner.

Naturally there's a hope on the horizon, which here comes in the form of Rodeo skills, this too brings the laughs, as does the number of prison characters that join in the plot. Notably Van Lidth's monstrous, and monstrously funny, Grossberger. Yes it's a roll call of prison stereotypes, from the top where the morally dubious Warden (Barry Corbin) sits, down to the cons where gays, bullies and gate happy loonies reside. With that, some of it now seems twee and badly out of date. So much so it's a film that is unlikely to garner a new and appreciative audience. However, those who were enamoured and found themselves laughing heartily with it back in the early 80s, should find that like myself, it holds up real well. Kind of like an old friend you call on when you need a pick me up. Hardly a superior comedy classic, then, but a film that rewards its fans on each subsequent revisit. 7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27171,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1980-12-12","keywords":"prison,prison yard,cell mate,woodpecker costume,jail","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stir Crazy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi910212889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNmOGMxNzYtMDY2NC00NmQyLWEwMWYtMTgyM2MyZDNlMzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWNmOGMxNzYtMDY2NC00NmQyLWEwMWYtMTgyM2MyZDNlMzg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000698/","name":"Gene Wilder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001640/","name":"Richard Pryor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113617/","name":"Georg Stanford Brown"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001627/","name":"Sidney Poitier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295171/","name":"Bruce Jay Friedman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0085883/","name":"Charles Blackwell"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Christmas Break-In: Directed by Michael Kampa. With Danny Glover, Denise Richards, Cameron Seely, Sean O'Bryan. Izzy is an energetic 9-year-old. Overscheduled and running late, her parents can't pick her up on time on the last day of school before Christmas break. A blizzard complicates the matter, but not as much so as a pair of bad guys who are freezing in an ice cream truck. programme.title: Passengers
Putnici
programme.desc: Passengers: Directed by Rodrigo García. With Anne Hathaway, Patrick Wilson, Andre Braugher, Dianne Wiest. A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0449487/","name":"Passengers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3ODE5MjIzMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4Nzc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0449487/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ellethekitty"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow and touching with a bit of suspense ...but mediocre","reviewBody":"I make my reviews short and sweet, and I only bother because there are too many over-rated movies there. This movie is mediocre, though most of the acting was reasonable, given the unusual situations the characters find themselves in. Anne Hathaway, who I do not particularly like, was reasonably good as a therapist facing some unusual situations. Her love interest, whose name I haven't bothered to look up, was adept at playing a character who is creating those situations for Anne. Really, the only reason I continued with the movie was because I was trying to figure out what was going on with him. it created some curiosity, although, at too slow a pace for me.\n\nIt will appeal more those who are intrigued by a mystery (and not a very complicated one), and a reassuring sense of comfort. The major flaws with this movie are first, its pace. If you have a short attention span and need any serious suspense, this is likely to bore you. Secondly, it borrows from another film pretty heavily, making it unoriginal.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36081,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Romance","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2008-09-26","keywords":"airplane crash,survivor,explosion,afterlife,doctor patient relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Passengers: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3525836825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5NDQ0Njk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5NDQ0Njk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2OTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first theatrical trailer for Passengers, directed by Rodrigo GarcÃ­a."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001556/","name":"David Morse"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006554/","name":"Rodrigo García"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123049/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159892/","name":"Ronnie Christensen"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
Hotel Transilvanija
programme.desc:
Hotel Transylvania: Directed by Genndy Tartakovsky. With Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James. Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0837562/","name":"Hotel Transylvania","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NjQyODI3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4NjM0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0837562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joe-is-sexy"},"dateCreated":"2012-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Some jokes are forced, but an overall enjoyable film!","reviewBody":"Hotel Transylvania stars: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James and David Spade. It goes for approximately 90 minutes. It fails to deliver GREAT 3D moments although some could be classified as 'GOOD'. 

The first half of the movie is what is called 'Jokes Are Failing' Syndrome. Although they do crack in a couple of good laughs in the first half, majority don't live up to expectations that animations nowadays do. Too many slapstick moments and unnecessary forced jokes... NOTE TO FILM-MAKERS: If jokes are forced... Don't even bother with the joke!

The movie has heart though, which kind of makes for it's first half. The second half however is fun, cool, funny and surprisingly a bit thrilling! It does have it's fun moments... I will admit. Although some of the 3D doesn't work I still found it to be a good animation... Is it the best animation of the year? NO WAY! But is it great as an animation? No, not really it is what I call 'A good animation if you just let your mind do nothing!' A B from me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239981,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-10-31","keywords":"monster,hotel,plane,party,dragon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2571739673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676221/","name":"Andy Samberg"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0850733/","name":"Genndy Tartakovsky"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063165/","name":"Peter Baynham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0806912/","name":"Robert Smigel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0244110/","name":"Todd Durham"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Grudge
Kletva
programme.desc:
The Grudge: Directed by Takashi Shimizu. With Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, William Mapother, Clea DuVall. An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0391198/","name":"The Grudge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxODg1Nzc3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0391198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olivewahh"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's still good after so many years","reviewBody":"With the new release of The Grudge, I went back and rewatched this original to see if it was as good as I had remembered.

Karen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) lives in Japan and works as a caretaker for the elderly people. Getting assigned a job, Karen visits the elder lady and begins to discover some unusual and mysterious behaviour coming from the house. After leaving the house, things become haunting for Karen with everywhere she goes and discovers a dark history of the house.

Honestly, for a film that came out in 2004, it's pretty good. I mean watching it now, the graphics aren't amazing, but again the film is 16 years old. I remember when the film came out that a lot of people said the original Japanese version was terrifying, but I still think this one is scary.

SMG was such an A Lister when this came out, after staring in Buffy and many other iconic movies, everyone knew who she was. She's not bad in the film, except when she runs like she's still in Buffy lol

Still would recommend this film to fans of horror. It's a great watch","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":142390,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"elderly,housewife,pet cat,bus,male frontal nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Grudge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi761242649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Grudge"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001264/","name":"Sarah Michelle Gellar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004736/","name":"Jason Behr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0245112/","name":"Clea DuVall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167921/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839812/","name":"Stephen Susco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0391198, Title: The Grudge, --- Description: The Grudge: Directed by Takashi Shimizu. With Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, William Mapother, Clea DuVall. An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0391198/","name":"The Grudge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxODg1Nzc3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0391198/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"olivewahh","dateCreated":"2020-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's still good after so many years","reviewBody":"With the new release of The Grudge, I went back and rewatched this original to see if it was as good as I had remembered.

Karen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) lives in Japan and works as a caretaker for the elderly people. Getting assigned a job, Karen visits the elder lady and begins to discover some unusual and mysterious behaviour coming from the house. After leaving the house, things become haunting for Karen with everywhere she goes and discovers a dark history of the house.

Honestly, for a film that came out in 2004, it's pretty good. I mean watching it now, the graphics aren't amazing, but again the film is 16 years old. I remember when the film came out that a lot of people said the original Japanese version was terrifying, but I still think this one is scary.

SMG was such an A Lister when this came out, after staring in Buffy and many other iconic movies, everyone knew who she was. She's not bad in the film, except when she runs like she's still in Buffy lol

Still would recommend this film to fans of horror. It's a great watch","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":142390,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"elderly,housewife,pet cat,bus,male frontal nudity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Grudge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi761242649","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Grudge","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001264/","name":"Sarah Michelle Gellar","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004736/","name":"Jason Behr","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0245112/","name":"Clea DuVall"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167921/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839812/","name":"Stephen Susco","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Butterfly Effect 2
Domino efekt 2
programme.desc: The Butterfly Effect 2: Directed by John R. Leonetti. With Eric Lively, Erica Durance, Dustin Milligan, Gina Holden. Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0457297/","name":"The Butterfly Effect 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjkzN2I0YWYtZjk1Ny00ZmNhLWE1MjYtMDE2MjkyNmQ5NmU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQwMjk0NjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Nick Larson discovers a supernatural way to alter his life and travel back in time to key moments in his life by looking at photographs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0457297/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RebelMe"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Repeating unrepeatable","reviewBody":"The reason why the first movie was very good (I would call it even brilliant) was, that for first half an hour, you didn't know what's going on here. You saw Kutcher's childhood which was from time to time affected by blackouts and you didn't know what they are for there. As this is a sequel, the tension was missing and the guy even didn't have blackouts at all. Many times during the new movie I felt like watching the first movie and that the new one just changed a few things. For example, compare the prison scene and the scene on toilets. This movie lacks strong scenes, which are replaced by sex. Again, remember the first movie - burning of a dog, dynamite in a box, visit at Lenny's room in hospital etc. Those moments were breathtaking, quick and strong. What do you have in the second one? A lot of people hate the ending of this movie, but well...how would you end it? It would be a disgrace if it was pure happy-end and also, they couldn't do partial happy-end, if they didn't want to repeat themselves again. All in all, this flick is very mediocre and the comparing to the original movie pushes it even lower. I won't say "AVOID IT!", watch it on some evening when you want to watch TV but the only thing they broadcast is Big Brother.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35368,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-08-10","keywords":"sex in a restroom,second part,blonde,unplanned pregnancy,copulation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Butterfly Effect 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2995388697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmVkOTE4YjEtMjA5YS00MDA0LThmOWMtMWY5NDYxODU1NzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmVkOTE4YjEtMjA5YS00MDA0LThmOWMtMWY5NDYxODU1NzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from New Line Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515123/","name":"Eric Lively"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1570568/","name":"Erica Durance"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1682420/","name":"Dustin Milligan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502954/","name":"John R. programme.title: Bølgen
Jezero straha vs. anakonda
programme.desc:
Bølgen: Directed by Roar Uthaug. With Kristoffer Joner, Ane Dahl Torp, Jonas Hoff Oftebro, Edith Haagenrud-Sande. Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3616916/","name":"Bølgen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE2NmNjOWMtZWJmNC00ZmFiLWI3ZDgtYWU3MWZhOGVhMTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg0NDI1MjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3616916/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wowmats"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"6.5! Decent :)","reviewBody":"The movie is about a geologist that discovers some weird activity in the mountains in Åkneset (Norway) They discover that unless they evacuate the whole city in time, a piece of the mountain will fall into the water and create a monster wave of 80m that will crush everything in its path. So now the geologist played by Kristoffer Joner is doing everything in his power to save his family and his beloved small town.

Short review. Great special effect, good score, good acting. Predictable script and lacks depth, but is still good enough entertainment for the whole family :) There is nothing revolutionary or new about this, but hey! Isn't it always pleasurable when things are done right?

Ps, it's also interesting that this is actually something that has happened before and might happen again!

Final thoughts...GO CHECK IT OUT!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36315,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-28","keywords":"natural disaster,disaster,disaster film,norway,flood","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2929702169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTcxMjYwOTE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ1NzUxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Even though awaited, no-one is really ready when the mountain pass of ÃƒÂ…kneset above the scenic narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger falls out and creates a 85 meter high violent tsunami. programme.title: Interior
Teror
programme.desc: Interior: Directed by Marek Lechki. With Magdalena Poplawska, Piotr Zurawski, Tomasz Sapryk, Lech Mackiewicz. Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. He drives across the interior of Poland, where people are preparing for a celebration of an unspecified anniversary. In the meanwhile, Magda (35), a Town Hall employee in charge of the anniversary events, Highly committed at first, gradually notices all the dirt and corruption around her. At some point, she must choose between her career and integrity, whether she should accept it or risk her career and leave. Finally, on the celebration day, Maciek and Magda finally meet. programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
Hotel Transilvanija
programme.desc:
Hotel Transylvania: Directed by Genndy Tartakovsky. With Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James. Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0837562/","name":"Hotel Transylvania","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NjQyODI3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4NjM0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0837562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joe-is-sexy"},"dateCreated":"2012-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Some jokes are forced, but an overall enjoyable film!","reviewBody":"Hotel Transylvania stars: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James and David Spade. It goes for approximately 90 minutes. It fails to deliver GREAT 3D moments although some could be classified as 'GOOD'. 

The first half of the movie is what is called 'Jokes Are Failing' Syndrome. Although they do crack in a couple of good laughs in the first half, majority don't live up to expectations that animations nowadays do. Too many slapstick moments and unnecessary forced jokes... NOTE TO FILM-MAKERS: If jokes are forced... Don't even bother with the joke!

The movie has heart though, which kind of makes for it's first half. The second half however is fun, cool, funny and surprisingly a bit thrilling! It does have it's fun moments... I will admit. Although some of the 3D doesn't work I still found it to be a good animation... Is it the best animation of the year? NO WAY! But is it great as an animation? No, not really it is what I call 'A good animation if you just let your mind do nothing!' A B from me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239981,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-10-31","keywords":"monster,hotel,plane,party,dragon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2571739673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter. programme.title: The English Patient
Engleski pacijent
programme.desc: The English Patient: Directed by Anthony Minghella. With Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Binoche, Willem Dafoe, Kristin Scott Thomas. At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116209/","name":"The English Patient","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkxZTdkNTQtM2QwOS00NzRlLWEyMGItYTcxOTE4NTgyNGVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mattymatt30"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"An epic tale of doomed love","reviewBody":"'The English Patient' can rightly be compared to the films of David Lean, whose sweeping epics such as 'Lawrence of Arabia' and 'Bridge on the River Kwai' must have inspired the director Anthony Minghella. The film is beautifully photographed, and like 'Lawrence', is set in Northern Africa, but during the second world war. The story is complex, but it boils down to a forbidden love between an opinionated and often difficult archeologist played by Ralph Fiennes and a married woman played by Kristin Scott Thomas.\n\n The story, based on a novel by Michael Ondaatje, is told in flashbacks by Fiennes' Count Laszlo de Almasy - the titular character. The fact that his name does not sound like he's English plays a key role in what unfolds. He has been badly burned in a plane crash, occurring just as the film opens, and is being cared for back in Europe by Hana, an army nurse played by Juliette Binoche. What makes this story epic is the vast sweep across place and time, and the development of characters beyond that of the two ill-fated lovers. The film makes clear that true love and passion, even with dreaded consequences, can make life worth living, or worth dying for. If you're a romantic at heart, and can appreciate a film without the standard happy endings and simple moral codes, you may find that 'The English Patient' speaks directly to you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185344,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance","War"],"datePublished":"1996-12-06","keywords":"patient,nurse,flashback,english,church","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"'The English Patient' !?!?! Anniversary Mashup","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi618447641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI1NDkxY2EtYTYyNC00OTNiLTllMjMtZTU1YTQ1NGU4NzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI1NDkxY2EtYTYyNC00OTNiLTllMjMtZTU1YTQ1NGU4NzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg","description":""What do you love? ... Say everything." In celebration of the 25th anniversary, we look back at Anthony Minghella's nine-time Oscar-winning film."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005237/","name":"Anthony Minghella"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034657/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0648546/","name":"Michael Ondaatje"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005237/","name":"Anthony Minghella"}],"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Evolution
Evolucija
programme.desc:
Evolution: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With David Duchovny, Julianne Moore, Orlando Jones, Seann William Scott. A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0251075/","name":"Evolution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU3YjhjZmItNzBjNi00YWVjLWE0ZGQtNGY1NTFmMDczMzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0251075/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FiendishDramaturgy"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is Under-rated!","reviewBody":"While this film is far from a masterpiece, Evolution deserves better ratings than it currently enjoys here at IMDb. The cast and crew contribute superior work, and the storyline is quite inventive. The premise has been done a few times before, however, it has never been done quite as well as the treatment it receives here.

Alien spores land here on Earth and begin to wreak havoc.

I found this highly entertaining, cleverly witty, with a slick production quality which tends to draw in the audience, who finds its members laughing, sometimes in spite of themselves. You won't WANT to like this. There is a large amount of juvenile humor, which usually would detract from a work such as this, but this is a sci-fi comedy that WORKS.

Again, it's no masterpiece, but it IS clever and fun, in spite of the sophomoric humor.

It rates a 7.3/10 from...

xXx
programme.desc: xXx: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Vin Diesel, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas, Samuel L. Jackson. An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295701/","name":"xXx","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZjZmM1ZDctNDhlZi00Mzk1LWFjNWItYzIxNGY2OWYzYjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295701/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"robjan1"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Turn off your brain and enjoy the ride...","reviewBody":"I would not dare to insult anyone's intelligence. With that said let me add, this movie will not insult yours, if you see it with the right attitude. Adrenaline pump set for full tilt boogie. This is not an intellectual movie, it is not a love story, and it certainly is not Rambo. What it is, is a series of action shorts connected by a common thread that is very much in vogue. Good guys vs. bad guys/terrorists and in so doing, overcome insurmountable odds to, 1. Do the " right thing " 2. Save the day, 3.Have a hell of a time doing it and 4. GET THE GIRL! If, you expect anymore than that, you will be disappointed. So, turn off you brain and enjoy the ride. If you enjoy extreme sports, action genre movies and bad guys with eastern european accents, sign up get ready to party. This is your movie! Oh, btw. Make sure you see this movie in a theatre that has GREAT sound. You will be rewarded."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-11","keywords":"snowboard,time bomb,kidnapping,tattoo on torso,adventure hero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451084569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000782/","name":"Asia Argento"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Saw VI
Slagalica strave 6
programme.desc:
Saw VI: Directed by Kevin Greutert. With Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Mark Rolston, Betsy Russell. Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1233227/","name":"Saw VI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NDA3MTM4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTY4Njg3Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1233227/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Movieboy_20"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly good","reviewBody":"Finally, the Saw series has regained some of it's previous credibility. Saw VI proved to be a very bloody, but clever mainstream romp.

There were a couple of great twists and turns, the gore was jacked up to a fantastic level of brutal extremity (easily beating the rather tame 5th installment), and most importantly, I, plus everyone in the theatre had a ball with it.

As well as being a valid continuation of the 'Saw' story, it worked well as a standalone film. The main twist actually had nothing do to with the previous movies... but don't get me wrong, you'll get plenty of answers for questions left open from the other films at the same time.

As you'd expect, the acting and production values weren't to flash, but the good screenplay and balls-out sadistic torture made this a vast improvement over the last couple of sequels. Apart from the first, I'm happy to say this is definitely one of my favorites from the series. 7.5/10.

Check it out. I found it to be a pleasant surprise.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":108201,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-01-06","keywords":"toilet,kicked in the balls,wetting pants,office politics,insurance company","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw VI: TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3762881049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxNjI2Nzk3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxNjI2Nzk3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Special Agent Strahm is dead, and Detective Hoffman has emerged as the unchallenged successor to Jigsaw's legacy. However, when the FBI draws closer to Hoffman, he is forced to set a game into motion, and Jigsaw's grand scheme is finally understood. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068551/","name":"Tobin Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541908/","name":"Costas Mandylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001679/","name":"Mark Rolston"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0340436/","name":"Kevin Greutert"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247116/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0306699/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733317/","name":"Patrick Melton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729303/","name":"Marcus Dunstan"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lake Placid 3
Jezero straha 3
programme.desc:
Lake Placid 3: Directed by Griff Furst. With Colin Ferguson, Yancy Butler, Kirsty Mitchell, Kacey Clarke. Killer crocodiles and their offspring terrorize residents of a small community." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1499249/","name":"Lake Placid 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZhMWJmYmItMDEwYy00ZTE4LTlkMzgtMzUzNDQ0Yjk2Mjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Killer crocodiles and their offspring terrorize residents of a small community.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1499249/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paul_haakonsen"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not only the lake was placid here...","reviewBody":"Truth be told, I didn't even know there was a 2nd and 3rd movie to the "Lake Placid" movie, so I just came over the third movie by coincidence. So I sat down and watched it.

And then the terror began...

Oh. My. God! The CGI effects in this movie were so unbelievably poor. The crocodiles were among the crappiest CGI creatures I have seen in a long, long time. The intentions were good, but the effects were so lousy.

As for the story? Well nothing much to be expected here. You have a pretty basic "let's make a sequel" movie here. Local people and animals being eaten by monstrously big crocodiles, and a gun happy hunter is brought into the fray. And a family with troubles that somehow manages to save the day. It is all here. And it has all been seen before.

The acting, well it was wholeheartedly attempted, and actually most weren't too shabby. Some were questionable to say the least. But, of course, this is not an award winning movie, just another SyFy flick.

I managed to sit through it, but I was so tempted to get up and find something else. Which I should have done. This movie is not really entertaining, it is in the line of being ridiculous. But generally I sit through a movie once I started it. I think you have to be a really, REALLY hardcore fan of the first "Placid Lake" movie to actually fully enjoy this movie.

Well, at least it was an attempt at making a movie with giant crocodiles, it just didn't work out all that well. This is not a good choice to put on if you want to be entertained by a good wholesome movie with giant creatures. There are lots of other (and better) movies out there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4699,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-08-21","keywords":"female full frontal nudity,bare breasts,female pubic hair,panties pulled down,female removes her clothes","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000319/","name":"Yancy Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593511/","name":"Kirsty Mitchell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0975225/","name":"Griff Furst"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0320980/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080897/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3593780/","name":"David Reed"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1499249, Title: Lake Placid 3, --- Description: Lake Placid 3: Directed by Griff Furst. With Colin Ferguson, Yancy Butler, Kirsty Mitchell, Kacey Clarke. Killer crocodiles and their offspring terrorize residents of a small community." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1499249/","name":"Lake Placid 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZhMWJmYmItMDEwYy00ZTE4LTlkMzgtMzUzNDQ0Yjk2Mjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Killer crocodiles and their offspring terrorize residents of a small community.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1499249/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"paul_haakonsen","dateCreated":"2010-08-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not only the lake was placid here...","reviewBody":"Truth be told, I didn't even know there was a 2nd and 3rd movie to the "Lake Placid" movie, so I just came over the third movie by coincidence. So I sat down and watched it.

And then the terror began...

Oh. My. God! The CGI effects in this movie were so unbelievably poor. The crocodiles were among the crappiest CGI creatures I have seen in a long, long time. The intentions were good, but the effects were so lousy.

As for the story? Well nothing much to be expected here. You have a pretty basic "let's make a sequel" movie here. Local people and animals being eaten by monstrously big crocodiles, and a gun happy hunter is brought into the fray. And a family with troubles that somehow manages to save the day. It is all here. And it has all been seen before.

The acting, well it was wholeheartedly attempted, and actually most weren't too shabby. Some were questionable to say the least. But, of course, this is not an award winning movie, just another SyFy flick.

I managed to sit through it, but I was so tempted to get up and find something else. Which I should have done. This movie is not really entertaining, it is in the line of being ridiculous. But generally I sit through a movie once I started it. I think you have to be a really, REALLY hardcore fan of the first "Placid Lake" movie to actually fully enjoy this movie.

Well, at least it was an attempt at making a movie with giant crocodiles, it just didn't work out all that well. This is not a good choice to put on if you want to be entertained by a good wholesome movie with giant creatures. There are lots of other (and better) movies out there.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4699,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-08-21","keywords":"female full frontal nudity,bare breasts,female pubic hair,panties pulled down,female removes her clothes","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000319/","name":"Yancy Butler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593511/","name":"Kirsty Mitchell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0975225/","name":"Griff Furst"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0320980/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080897/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3593780/","name":"David Reed"],"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Insidious: Chapter 2: Directed by James Wan. With Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Barbara Hershey, Lin Shaye. The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2226417/","name":"Insidious: Chapter 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0OTA5ODIxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUzNDg4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2226417/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jaguiar313"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Insidious sequel is spooky fun.","reviewBody":"Insidious: Chapter 2 starts up almost right after the original Insidious ended with Josh (Patrick Wilson) and Renai (Rose Byrne) Lambert reunited with their son Dalton (Ty Simpkins) after his spirit was held prisoner by a demon in an afterlife dimension called 'The Further'. But, as we saw in the final frames, something else was now inhabiting Josh's body and it had strangled paranormal investigator Elise (Lin Shaye) to death. We pick up as the unsuspecting family, including older son Foster (Andrew Astor) and their infant daughter Kali, have moved in with Josh's mother Lorraine (Barbara Hershey) while police investigate Elise's mysterious death in their house. They are barely moved in when supernatural occurrences start to begin again with objects moving, spectral voices, apparitions appearing and dear old dad acting very strange. While Renai tries to deal with the fact that supernatural forces are still with them, Josh tries to convince her all is well and Lorraine decides to team up with Elise's former assistants paranormal investigators Specs (Leigh Whannell who also wrote the screenplay) and Tucker (Angus Sampson) along with one of the original investigators from Josh's childhood haunting, Carl (Steve Coulter) to get down to the bottom of these haunted hi-jinx once and for all. And that is all I will say about the story as, despite some familiar trappings, James Wan (The Conjuring) takes this installment in some clever directions and once again uses the familiar elements very well. We get to know the story behind the evil woman in black seen in the last film and even revisit The Further though, this time it is inventively linked to events in the first film. The pace is a bit slower and more methodical this time round but, since this film is a bit of a mystery as well as haunting, it takes it's time to let the story unfold and secrets be revealed. We still get some spooky scenes but, it is refreshingly mixed in with Lorraine and co's equally goose bump inducing investigation. And what they find is deviously fun. The film is not quite as lively as Insidious part one but, I liked the mystery element and the film earned points with me for using it's return to 'The Further' a bit more clever and less silly then last time. That is the point where the first film lost it's grip on me and here I like how it was done and was with this supernatural chiller up to the spooky end. Wan is a good director and he takes what could have been a ho-hum retread and makes it a fun follow-up. He gets good performances out of all his cast and while I found Patrick Wilson to be bland in both Insidious and The Conjuring, he gets a far more lively performance out of him here. He gets to ham it up a bit and it suits him. The film has some beautiful and creepy visuals, as is Wan's trademark, and Joseph Bishara's score adds some nice atmosphere too. So in conclusion, while the story elements are more familiar; we've seen some of it before and the pace a bit slower, Wan does give us a spooky mystery to add to the paranormal activity and makes much more clever use of his otherworldly 'Further'. He also gives us some clever answers to the questions left by his first Insidious and that all adds up to a spooky fun time at the movies. Also stars House Of The Devil's Joceline Donahue as young Lorraine in some equally clever flashback sequences that tie into the rest of the film in a fun way."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":164356,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2013-09-13","keywords":"police detective,barricading a door,injection in leg,taser,attacked with a knife","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4286163225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2ODQzODA0OTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU4NjU4MTAx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2ODQzODA0OTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDU4NjU4MTAx._V1_.jpg","description":"A haunted family struggles to uncover a terrifying secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world in Insidious: Chapter 2."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933940/","name":"Patrick Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126284/","name":"Rose Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001347/","name":"Barbara Hershey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314851/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1191481/","name":"Leigh Whannell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tuđinka
programme.desc: Serija priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Outlander je televizijska serija temeljena na istoimenoj povijesnoj seriji romana koju je napisala Diana Gabaldon, prateći priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Nakon završetka Drugog svjetskog rata Claire Randall konačno se ponovno sastaje sa suprugom Frankom.

programme.title: The Breed
The Shield
programme.desc: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Breed
The Shield
programme.desc: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
Charliejevi anđeli
programme.desc: Charlie's Angels: Directed by McG. With Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Bill Murray. Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160127/","name":"Charlie's Angels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1NTM5MTItNDcxMS00YTIwLTg1NjUtNzE5ZGE5NDkxMmU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160127/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moonspinner55"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"High-spirited, infectious ridiculousness","reviewBody":"Head-spinning collage of technically marvelous effects in theatrical remake of cult late-'70s TV series. Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Lui are attractive, funny, resourceful, sexy and--most importantly (and surprisingly) quite convincing as super-detectives. Their case (involving rival software companies, a kidnapping, and the planned assassination of boss Charlie) doesn't make a whole lot of sense, and Bill Murray is out-of-it as confidante Bosley, but director McG's modern-comic action is so lightning-fast and silky smooth you may be having too much fun to notice. Some of the satire is actually rather smart, and the girls are game for just about anything. **1/2 from ****","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":182862,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-17","keywords":"martial arts,undercover agent,based on tv series,spy,secret agent","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Charlie's Angels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1029678105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Charlie's Angels"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629334/","name":"McG"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746598/","name":"Ryan Rowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041864/","name":"John August"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
Legenda o vitezu
programme.desc: A Knight's Tale: Directed by Brian Helgeland. With Heath Ledger, Rufus Sewell, Shannyn Sossamon, Paul Bettany. After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0183790/","name":"A Knight's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE5OTE4OTE2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDkzMTQ3._V1_.jpg","description":"After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0183790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Danny_kahn"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining","reviewBody":"This comment is to counter those who have issue with modern rock and other time problems being in this movie. This movie was designed to entertain. It was NOT a historical piece and nowhere does it claim to be one. This is the story of a boy who aspires to be more than what society set out for him. The movie uses odd references to history's great figures and humor to bring its story across to the viewer. So I say that, for those of you who cannot enjoy a piece of entertainment due to its well placed use of anachronisms, I strongly suggest you stay away from any of Shakespeare's works. (Not to say that this movie was on level with Shakespeare...) The makers of "A Knight's Tale" set out to entertain, and did so dutifully.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180335,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"medieval times,knight,jousting,london england,chaucer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Knight's Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2427715865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMzRmODYtOTRmMy00ZjQwLTk4MjAtNDQ5YjQ2NTZjZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005132/","name":"Heath Ledger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001722/","name":"Rufus Sewell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035535/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tian di ying xiong
Ratnici neba i zemlje
programme.desc: Tian di ying xiong: Directed by Ping He. With Wen Jiang, Kiichi Nakai, Xueqi Wang, Wei Zhao. A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0374330/","name":"Tian di ying xiong","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMjQ2MzI3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM2NjYyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374330/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gnosis1"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Incredible. Best movie I have seen in a long time.","reviewBody":"This movie is the story of an Imperial Agent sent to bring to justice a murderer, his final mission before he is allowed to go home to his family in Japan. The murderer, a former army officer accused of mutiny when he refused to kill a group of women and children. The movie is the tale of their trek across the desert fighting against each other and with each other. The dialog was great, short and delivered impeccably by an incredible cast of characters. It has been a long while since I have seen such thoughtful, dramatic acting. The movie is shot mostly in the desert but it is all done beautifully and with exactly the right tone and feel. I enjoyed the period costumes and the fight scenes were extremely well choreographed. It is seldom that I watch a hollywood movie and come away feeling satisfied, I can only hope that Asia continues to pump out incredible movies like this one and that Hollywood will wise up and stop trying to feed me drivel like the Last Samurai.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4213,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"ancient china,8th century,tang dynasty,turkic,soldier","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Warriors of Heaven and Earth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225827097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE1ZDY1NTYtYWU0Yi00ODZhLTg0OTEtZmFjZjY5MjFkNTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE1ZDY1NTYtYWU0Yi00ODZhLTg0OTEtZmFjZjY5MjFkNTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0422638/","name":"Wen Jiang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0620018/","name":"Kiichi Nakai"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1281653/","name":"Xueqi Wang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372092/","name":"Ping He"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0292901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047123/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0258268/","name":"Richard Epcar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372092/","name":"Ping He"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955399/","name":"Rui Zhang"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="
