programme.desc: Impostor: Directed by Gary Fleder. With Gary Sinise, Madeleine Stowe, Vincent D'Onofrio, Tony Shalhoub. In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160399/","name":"Impostor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmUyOGI5YjYtN2IzNC00MTQzLWJhZjYtZDI1YmI3N2VjNGJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160399/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Silvermax268"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"How many more great stories of his our out there I have not read!","reviewBody":"This Movie was great! What I really wanna know is how much it differs from the book. I also enjoyed paycheck & although I, Robot was not one of his short stories it sure felt like one. This movie especially the first time I saw it had me hoping for one thing, then expecting another & then just when I thought I had it figured out it all blew up in my face...(literally) OUTSTANDING! See it! Much like Riddick! this Movie & story is just plain Great Sci-FI! Gary does an outstanding job convincing you that he is indeed not guilty, then you have trouble believing him as he starts to doubt himself, the whole time thinking maybe the government is just crazy, but slowly you put the pieces together & just when you think you know who or what he/she is... Just see it, it is amazing SCI-FI! I am going to buy a copy right now. ENJOY!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23348,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-01-04","keywords":"watching tv,chair bondage,botox,slums,nasty face","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Impostor: Director's Cut","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1105789209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTE4YWE4NTEtNzE4NS00NjgwLWE5ODItYjNiZjY3NWE2YTUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTE4YWE4NTEtNzE4NS00NjgwLWE5ODItYjNiZjY3NWE2YTUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111274/","name":"Shane Brolly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000352/","name":"Vincent D'Onofrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000641/","name":"Gary Sinise"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001219/","name":"Gary Fleder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001140/","name":"Philip K. programme.title: Paranormal Witness
Nadnaravna svjedočanstva
programme.desc: Paranormal Witness: With Gillian English, Frances Townend, Daniel Cannis, Colin Murphy. A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1874066/","name":"Paranormal Witness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkZTQxZTEtN2VjYi00ZDg3LTlkZDAtMWIzMGNjODcwMzE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY0NzcxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1874066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"boywonderpowpunch"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very Scary Show","reviewBody":"I have watched a lot of paranormal shows and in my opinion this one is one of the best. It retells the stories about paranormal events people have experienced by combining re-enacted scenes with real interviews and sometimes real footage. The show is able to create such an eerie and scary atmosphere that you feel like you were there when the event took place. After seeing season 1 episode 1, I had to watch them all. Season 2 should be promising, however I am not sure how I feel about S2E1 this ghost story is familiar to me and I am not quite sure I buy the whole ghost trying to hang a man with a make shift noose in the attic story, I feel this could be a hoax but you never know, they seem very reasonable and truthful people who would not be still lying about something for 20 some years but stranger things have happened.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2599,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"genre":["Documentary","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-09-07","keywords":"haunting,poltergeist,two word title,eyewitness account,documentary series","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7025791/","name":"Gillian English"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3266807/","name":"Frances Townend"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3141457/","name":"Daniel Cannis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178419/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paranormal Witness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3941252377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal Witness"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pulse
Impuls
programme.desc: Pulse: Directed by Jim Sonzero. With Kristen Bell, Ian Somerhalder, Christina Milian, Rick Gonzalez. When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454919/","name":"Pulse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyOTg5MjY1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM1ODYzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454919/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jellyneckr"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the worst horror movies ever made!","reviewBody":"Years ago when Wes Craven was still attached to direct this American remake of the almost perfect Japanese thriller, I was quite excited to see it. Seeing as Craven had never made a bad movie (except for the Hills Have Eyes sequel, which was taken away from him), I thought it would be great. Unexpectedly, the project was canceled when Bob Weinstein thought it was too similar to THE RING and sent Craven to work on the disastrous CURSED instead. Eventually Weinstein found a way to make a cheaper, ultra dumbed down version of PULSE, completely scraping any intelligence left in Craven's original screenplay (he still maintains a writing credit, which Craven says does not reflect his work). The result is one of the top five worst horror movies ever made. A complete and total insult to anyone who pays money to watch it. This made-for-teens only abomination represents everything that is wrong with the horror genre today: over-explanation to the point of aggravation (the producers must think we are brain-dead as an audience), the casting of pop stars instead of actual actors (Christina Milian), and cookie-cutter editing due the number of times the picture was re-edited and re-shot to get a PG-13 rating. Even Kristen Bell, great on "Veronica Mars", seems bored here. You will be too if you make the mistake of watching this. It's ironic that a movie called PULSE doesn't have one. 0/10."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":28946,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-03-14","keywords":"server room,suicide,apocalypse,paranoia,fear","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068338/","name":"Kristen Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0327779/","name":"Rick Gonzalez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0587396/","name":"Christina Milian"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814517/","name":"Jim Sonzero"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037852/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038165/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0475905/","name":"Kiyoshi Kurosawa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1242522/","name":"Ray Wright"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="
